overview: Coorg, also known as Kodagu, is a hilly district in the state of Karnataka, India, famous for its coffee plantations, lush forests and pleasant climate.
bestTimeToVisit: October to March (cool and dry season)
travelTips: Travel by bus or private car; roads are winding.
Carry warm clothing for evenings even in summer.
Book accommodation in advance during peak season.
Try local Coorgi cuisine such as pandi curry.
Respect local customs and avoid littering in natural areas.
